title: Betsy DeVos "Hostages No More-The Fight for Education Freedom and the Future of the American Child"
description:
Former Education Secretary Betsy DeVos talks about her time serving in the Trump administration and offers her thoughts on education reforms to fix schools.  She's interviewed by Jeb Bush, former Governor of Florida.
